item.description:
The dances have been a great sucess. We had 181 in attendance at the May 8th dance. The word is getting out! It is a nice safe venue to even attend alone.

This is in conjuction with another meetup group.

SINGLES DANCE
Featuring DJ Steve Vinzi
Playing dance tunes from the 80s, 90s and
contemporary ''freestyle'' music

All ages welcome ~ $10.00 admission
Coffee will be provided Cash bar available

Contact: Ozzie T., 774-262-0075 planetoz122089@aol.com
item.how_to_find_us: Tables in bar side area with meet up signs on them
item.name: Maronis Park Singles Dance
